# ConnectionState

The ConnectionState component displays the connection status of the room in written form.

## Import

```typescript
import { ConnectionState } from '@livekit/components-react';
```

## Usage

```tsx
<LiveKitRoom>
  <ConnectionState />
</LiveKitRoom>
```

{% partial file="p_usage.md" /%}

## Properties

{% parameter name="room" type="Room" optional=true %}
_(Optional)_ The room from which the connection status should be displayed.

{% /parameter %}
